ValidationRule.description: This rule is used to restrict user who is not a member of Marcom Team to update status field on client contact.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT( ISNEW() ), $Profile.Name <> 'GT Marcom Team', $Profile.Name <> 'Pardot Admin', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Markets Ecosystems', ISCHANGED( Contact_status__c ), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Contact_status__c ))), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Contact_status__c, 'Pending DS Team Approval')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Contact_status__c, 'New Contact Creation'))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only markets ecosystems team can change the Contact Status to Active/Inactive.
